## intersects() function

Calculates whether or not the two rectangles intersect.  intersects 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function intersects(r1: RectangleXY, r2: RectangleXY): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r1 | [RectangleXY](./util.rectanglexy) | First rectangle |
|  r2 | [RectangleXY](./util.rectanglexy) | Second rectangle  {<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->} True if the rectangles intersect, false otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
